value.title: Microsoft Power Apps Portals | 2019 release wave 2 overview
value.excerpt: In this overview video, we will highlight some of the new capabilities included in Microsoft Power Apps Portals that will help you plan and prepare for the upcoming updates with confidence.     Here are the capabilities covered:  • Low-code responsive website creation  • Commercial or enterprise login
